definition: to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

pinyin: guo2 jia1 lu:3 you2 du4 jia4 qu1

sentences.english: Welcome to Four Seasons Resort Mauritius at Anahita.
sentences.chinese: 毛里求斯安娜希塔四季度假村。

sentences.english: It just happens that we need a few salesmen now to replace those who are on vacation .
sentences.chinese: 现在赶巧我们需要几位售货员代替那些现在度假的。

sentences.english: Mr Garriott, however, is not just a holiday-maker.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，加雷特先生不单单是来度假的。

sentences.english: The plane was full of holiday-makers.
sentences.chinese: 飞机场挤满了去度假的人。

sentences.english: Anita, you haven't decided where you are going on holiday?
sentences.chinese: 艾尼塔，你还没决定去哪儿度假吗？

sentences.english: She is busy touring Tahiti right now.
sentences.chinese: 她正在大溪地忙著度假。

sentences.english: Daredevil couple decided to vacation far out.
sentences.chinese: 冒失鬼夫妇决定远出旅游度假。

sentences.english: A suitcase is enough to take your clothes with you on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 一只手提箱足够装得下度假时替换的衣服。

sentences.english: Lili: George, how can we? Vacations cost money.
sentences.chinese: 乔治，我们怎么去得了？度假要花钱。

sentences.english: My days of roughing it in hostels or fleabag motels are over.
sentences.chinese: 在招待所和廉价汽车旅馆度假的日子已经过去了。

sentences.english: A young blonde was on vacation in the depths of Louisiana.
sentences.chinese: 一位年轻的金发女郎在路易斯安那州中部度假。

sentences.english: He dropped in on some old comrades on his vacation trip to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他在去北京度假时顺便访问一些老同志。

sentences.english: They talked of their holiday plans with great animation.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常起劲地谈着度假计划。

sentences.english: Don't you need to break in your leather shoes before you take them on your vacation?
sentences.chinese: 在你要穿这皮鞋去度假时，不用先穿穿它们吗？

sentences.english: Yes. Every year my family would always go on... about a two-week vacation
sentences.chinese: 是的，我和家人每年都要去度假两周左右。

sentences.english: It cost me a fortune for vacation in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 在香港度假花了我好多钱。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to go on a tour/to have an outing
leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
Tahiti, island of the Society Islands group in French Polynesia (Tw)
to get well/to heal/to recuperate/to convalesce/convalescence/to nurse
